ygData.subject: Re: Bellow & just a comment in response to Bob Stewart's
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At 14 level I m doing 8s pretty consistently. ... That s a good word.  Anyone who s spoken English for any amount of time should intuitively know what you
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:19 AM 6/28/99 -0400, Dan Harmon wrote:
>I just got Bellow (lvl 12) and I see it only does 7pts damage. Does the
>damage go up? How quickly (as in, only 1hp per level, or what?)?

At 14 level I'm doing 8s pretty consistently.

>I use "critters" just to tick off the programmer-type geeks. <g>

That's a good word. Anyone who's spoken English for any amount of time
should intuitively know what you mean. Picking terminology is far more
important and difficult than most people realize, bit ultimately if you're
think about the origins of words just a little it becomes waaaaay easier.

Bob
